name: Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad
description: This Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad has croutons, parmesan cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, pasta, and chicken smothered in a creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain water and set aside to cool. Chop the grilled chicken breasts into small chunks. Â In a large bowl toss together chicken, cooked penne pasta, lettuce, cucumber, carrot, green onion, cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese and croutons. Drizzle with desired amount of Caesar salad dressing and toss to coat.
